name: Tunnel (Lucas Kauff)
description:
You lost your kid in some caves. All you can do is choose between two doors and not come back.

This is a simple and short text-based game developed in 5 days.

Controls:

  • Left click on a door to choose it.
  • R to restart a game.
  • M to go back to the menu.

Musics:

  • "Scary Ethereal Ambient" by theojt: https://freesound.org/people/theojt/sounds/510807
  • Sketch? by karramma: https://freesound.org/people/karramma/sounds/520946/
  • "Playground Turnaround" by shortiefoeva2: https://freesound.org/people/shortiefoeva2/sounds/405220/
